document.full_text: for the u.s. national team, what happens in saturday's exhibition game against spain is secondary to what the united states does in the coming concacaf gold cup.
document.title: why the gold cup is more important than beating spain
lines_and_colors: for the u.s. national team, what happens in saturday's exhibition game against spain is secondary to what the united states does in the coming concacaf gold cup.
